column3: Latest;Kampot:------  On the night of August 19
column5: a crackdown sex work in Kampot Bay’s Kraing Ampil led to the arrest of several Chinese men.------Police detained 9 Chinese nationals are reported to have been detained; 4 males and 5 women
column6: along with promotional materials advertising prostitution services and some condoms. After the arrest
column7: the suspects were sent for further legal action.------Updates to follow (------Arey News------)
